title: CD Lumbreras
text:
Club Deportivo Lumbreras is a <a href="List%20of%20football%20clubs%20in%20Spain">football</a> team based in <a href="Puerto%20Lumbreras">Puerto Lumbreras</a>, <a href="Murcia">Murcia</a>. Founded in 1968, the team plays in <a href="Divisiones%20Regionales%20de%20F%C3%BAtbol%20in%20the%20Region%20of%20Murcia">Primera Autonómica</a>. 
The club's home ground is "<a href="Estadio%20Municipal%20de%20Puerto%20Lumbreras">Estadio Municipal</a>".
